notifications.email: You won't receive any gigs before you have confirmed your email-address.
notifications.standby: You are currently on standby and can not be booked.
notifications.standby-public: This DJ is currently on standby and can not be booked.
notifications.picture: You should update your profile picture.
notifications.empty: You don't have any new notifications.

preferences.delete-warning: Are you sure you want to delete? All future gigs, events and payments will be lost.
preferences.payout-info: To get paid, you need to set up a payout method. Cueup releases payouts about 24 hours after a job is finished.
preferences.card-info: Last 4 digits of current account number
preferences.currency: What currency do you wish to have prices shown in?
preferences.email: What kind of notifications do you wish to receive?
preferences.cancelation: How many days notice do you allow for cancelations? If the organizer wants to cancel the event within less days, the percentage specified below will be refunded. The organizer will have to agree to this policy when confirming your offer.
preferences.refund: How many percentage of the offer should be returned if the organizer cancels within less days than your minimum notice?
preferences.standby: Are you unavailable to play at the moment? You will not receive requests if you're unavailable.
preferences.permalink: What URL do you want people to find you at.
preferences.password: Request an email to change your password.
preferences.email-verification: Request an email to verify your email.

messages.cancelled: The gig has been cancelled 驕좶잺
messages.declined: You have declined the gig 游땵
messages.lost: You have lost the gig 驕좶잺
messages.confirmed: The gig has been confirmed, get ready to play 游때
messages.accepted: Waiting on confirmation from organizer 游땕
messages.requested: Event happens soon, make your offer quickly 游뱀

gig.status-description: The gig request will automatically be declined if you don't make an offer within this time. Remember, you can change the offer up until the organizer has paid.

event.info-description: If the information below is not enough to give an offer, don't hesitate contacting the organizer.
event.rider-dj: The organizer does not need speakers or lights.
event.rider-lights: The organizer needs you to bring lights for the event.
event.rider-speakers: The organizer needs you to bring speakers.
event.rider-speakers-lights: The organizer needs you to bring speakers and light.
event.duration-description: The music should start at ${ start }, and end at ${ end }.
event.contact-description: Contact ${ name } to discuss the price, or figure out additional details.

offer.intro: Enter your price to play this gig. You can always update the offer until it has been paid.
offer.point: Use a Cueup point to discard the Cueup fee. You can update whether to use or not use the point, until the offer has been paid. If the gig gets cancelled, the point will be restored.
offer.direct: This gig is a direct booking of you, therefore the Cueup fee is discarded.
offer.service-fee-info:
This fee is calculated based
on the offer.
The organizer will pay this fee.
offer.dj-fee-info:
A fee on 3% is subtracted
from your price. Using a Cueup
point will discard this fee.
offer.lost:
Sorry you have lost this gig to another DJ.
Next time try to set another price or be faster at responding.
Adding info to your profile also helps the organizer being comfortable in choosing you.
offer.update-payout: Please update your payout information before making an offer.
offer.decline-warning: Are you sure you want to decline the gig?
offer.cancel-warning: Are you sure you want to cancel the gig? All money will be refunded to the organizer.

profile.name: Your full name. We only show your first name.
profile.email: Updating your email means you have to confirm it again.
profile.phone: We only share your phone number with people you contact through Cueup.
profile.genres: The kind of music you play.
profile.bio: Please tell us a bit about yourself. What kind of DJ are you? What is your level of experience? What kind of events do you usually play at?
profile.refer-1-description: At Cueup you can get more money by referring people to the site. The link below is used to book you directly. In case someone books you using your link, the Cueup fee will be removed from the gig, and you will get the full payout.
profile.refer-2-description: At Cueup you can get points for referring other DJs to the site. The link below is used for referring DJs to the site. In case a DJ signs up using your link, you will get a Cueup point whenever the referred DJ makes his or hers first offer. Cueup points are used when making an offer to remove the Cueup fee.
profile.location: This is the area where you will receive gigs. To edit the location or radius, click the edit information button, and drag in the points that appear on the circle.

en.You have a gig request 游때: You have a gig request 游때

public-profile.location: The DJ normally plays in this area.
public-profile.refund: Full refund if event is cancelled ${ days } or more days before it starts. Otherwise ${ percentage }% is refunded.

en.empty-reviews-own:
Ask your customers to leave a review.
It will help you get more gigs.
en.empty-reviews: This DJ does not have any reviews.
en.Appears after the offer is confirmed by: Appears after the offer is confirmed by the organizer.
